page.title: 16Parish Church, Wolverhampton
page.content: The rector of St. Mary's C.E. Church in Bushbury is the Reverend Roger Hinton. He told us that there have been a lot of changes in the services over the past few years. The church belongs to the people to worship God in and everyone should take part. Many of the congragation, which is often 250 or more, play musical instruments during the hymns. There are house parties in the church, family services and an old people's service on Mondays. People used to do as they were told, but nowadays they like to think for themselves and do not always agree with the rector. There are a lot of activities during the week like choir practices, bible study classes and cubs. The church is about 500 years old, and has played a part in the history of Wolverhampton.
